lead_paragraph: Crimea, caught in a sporting limbo after Russia annexed it from Ukraine, is to field a national soccer team in a tournament it plans to host next year, but its only likely opponents are statelets without international recognition.

headline.print_headline: In Sporting Wilderness, Crimea Team Seeks Fixtures
headline.main: In Sporting Wilderness, Crimea Team Seeks Fixtures

snippet: Crimea, caught in a sporting limbo after Russia annexed it from Ukraine, is to field a national soccer team in a tournament it plans to host next year, but its only likely opponents are statelets without international recognition....
